metadata.description: Station layout and room definitions for Alien in the Machine - Phase 2 Interactive Objects
notes: This file defines the 4-room station layout with Phase 2 interactive elements
Each room MUST have doors with targetRoomId for connectivity
Phase 2 adds items, furniture, searchable areas, and hiding spots
Keep this file modular - it should be easy to swap out different station layouts

rooms.name: Docking Bay
rooms.description: A large chamber with massive airlock doors. Emergency lights cast an eerie red glow across scattered cargo containers and maintenance equipment.

doors.description: Heavy blast door leading to the main corridor

items.name: Security Keycard
items.description: A magnetic security card with 'BRIDGE ACCESS - AUTHORIZED PERSONNEL ONLY' stamped in red letters.

items.name: Emergency Toolkit
items.description: A compact toolkit containing basic repair tools and diagnostic equipment.

furniture.name: Cargo Container Alpha
furniture.description: A large metal shipping container with 'MEDICAL SUPPLIES' stenciled on the side.

furniture.name: Cargo Container Beta
furniture.description: A smaller container marked 'TECHNICAL EQUIPMENT' that appears to have been hastily sealed.

furniture.name: Maintenance Station
furniture.description: A workbench with various tools and equipment scattered around.

rooms.name: Main Corridor
rooms.description: A central hallway connecting the major sections of the station. Flickering overhead lights illuminate worn metal plating and utility pipes running along the walls.

doors.description: Heavy blast door leading to the docking bay
Reinforced door to the bridge - requires security clearance

items.name: Emergency Flashlight
items.description: A heavy-duty flashlight with emergency power cells. Still functional.

furniture.name: Equipment Locker
furniture.description: A maintenance locker built into the wall. The lock is broken.

furniture.name: Maintenance Alcove
furniture.description: A small recessed area with utility panels and pipes.

rooms.name: Medical Bay
rooms.description: A sterile medical facility with examination tables, medical equipment, and supply cabinets. Some equipment appears to have been hastily abandoned.

items.name: Medical Supplies
items.description: A collection of bandages, medical tape, and basic first aid equipment.

items.name: Diagnostic Scanner
items.description: A portable medical scanner for analyzing injuries and health status.

furniture.name: Examination Table
furniture.description: A medical examination table with built-in diagnostic equipment.

furniture.name: Medical Supply Cabinet A
furniture.description: A locked cabinet containing medical supplies. The lock appears damaged.

furniture.name: Medical Supply Cabinet B
furniture.description: An emergency medical cabinet with a broken seal.

rooms.name: Command Bridge
rooms.description: The station's nerve center, filled with command consoles, communication equipment, and tactical displays. Multiple screens show various station systems and external views.

doors.description: Reinforced door from the bridge - requires security clearance

items.name: Research Data Pad
items.description: A secure data pad containing classified research information. The screen flickers with important data.

furniture.name: Command Console
furniture.description: The main command and control interface for the entire station.

furniture.name: Communication Terminal
furniture.description: Long-range communications equipment for contacting other stations and ships.

furniture.name: Tactical Display
furniture.description: A large holographic display showing station schematics and security status.

stationLayout.name: Research Station Alpha-7
